Reviews.Title: good picture for price
Reviews.Author: Jambo FTCW "Tech Special"
Reviews.Content: cameras are not HD cameras so you shouldnt expect that quality of picture - but - for the price you get good picture in daylight plus maybe 15-20 ft range b/w at night

ProductInfo.Features:
ZMODO PKC-4094S15 Weatherproof Color IR Outdoor Security Camera Kit
1/4" Color CMOS Image Sensor, 480 TV Lines, Horizontal, 6mm Lens, Signal: NTSC, Night Vision Min.
Light: 0 Lux (IR On), IR Irradiation Distance: up to 30', Operation Temperature: -25F~122F, Weatherproof: Yes
Power: 12V DC, Mount: Ceiling or Wall, Video Connector: BNC, Power Connector: RCA 12V DC, Color: Black
Package Includes: (4) CM-C21606BK Outdoor Color IR Security Camera, (4) 60' Video + Power All-in-one Cable for Security Camera, (1) 12V 1500mA 4 Port Power Supply for Surveillance Camera
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo PKC-4094S15 Weatherproof Color IR Outdoor Security Camera Kit
